name: ADIOS Amigos: A Space Physics Odyssey
description: Welcome to the peculiar universe of ADIOS Amigos. A game with serious astrophysics in a comic setting for 1-4 players. Explore solar systems in the quest to find your home in this space physics odyssey.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 capable GPU minimum 2GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: 3.0 GHz Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
